name: Coronarun
description:
Coronarun is a side-scrolling platformer that slowly builds up the difficulty with every level, demanding the player to adapt to the dangers of every room.

  • Lead Carl through his struggle to escape from his hometown of Little Loch Valley, alive.
  • The Difficulty bar is slowly raised as new enemies are introduced between stages and chapters.
  • Featuring over twenty-five levels containing multiple rooms and challenges.
  • A story told through prologue, cutscenes and ending.
  • The game features original content in the form of retro pixel graphics in its simplest form and old school sound.
